name: Star Project
description: STAR PROJECT - it's a great opportunity to meet new species and demonstrate superiority of the earthlings over all other populated worlds. Meet with unprecedented aggressive-minded space races and crush their best pilots! Your task is to destroy any military flotilla, which only meet in the deep space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel® Pentium® III or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

reviews.review_text: You misspelled health... That sums up the game.
